ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s a brush with far-from-greatness! MAD #547 is on sale now! Featuring Trump-inspired spoofs of famous paintings! Plus, Sergio Aragonés' MAD Look at Wonder Woman, “How to Reduce Your College Costs” and “What’s on Vladimir Putin’s Desk”! Also, The MAD Strip Club, Spy vs. Spy, The Fold-In and much more! We’re canvasing for your support – go buy it today!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:30:16. [Issue ID 614980]
